key.name: dark-theme-variant
key.summary: Use the dark theme variant for OvGU Mensa
key.description: This key determines whether the dark theme variant of your GTK theme is used for OvGU Mensa or not.

key.name: default-canteen
key.summary: Select the canteen which should be displayed on startup
key.description: This key determines which canteen should be selected by default upon startup of OvGU Mensa.

key.name: menu-history-length
key.summary: Set the duration in days for how long old menus should be kept
key.description: This key determines for how long old canteen menus should be kept in a local cache. The duration is given in days. It does not change how many upcoming menus will be stored.
